Name: Hidden Forest
About the game: It's a first-person shooter that allows you to explore islands，The player can kill enemies, dodge their attacks, and pick up their weapons after killing them. Control keys: Right-click targeting WASD movement The left Shift running Left mouse button attack Space leaping The left Ctrl squats Mouse control direction R Loaded Weapons G the bomb Middle mouse button switch weapons
